    • Method Detail

      • write

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> write​(java.util.List<FileDto> fileDtos)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a list of FileDtos to external storage
        Parameters:
        fileDtos - the file data transfer objects to serialize; may not be null
        Returns:
        the list of files that were successfully written; never null; may be empty
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if fileDtos is null
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred while trying to serialize the data

      • getFileMetadata

        public static FileStorageService.FileMetadata getFileMetadata​(android.net.Uri uri)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves file metadata
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri of the file; may not be null
        Returns:
        the file metadata; never null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred while accessing the file
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri was null

      • getFileMetadata

        public static FileStorageService.FileMetadata getFileMetadata​(android.net.Uri uri,
                                                              android.content.ContentResolver contentResolver)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves file metadata
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri of the file; may not be null
        contentResolver - the ContentResolver used to retrieve the metadata; may not be null
        Returns:
        the file metadata; never null
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri or contentResolver is null
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred while accessing the file

      • getFile

        public static java.io.File getFile​(android.net.Uri uri)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a file handle based off a uri
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri of the file; may not be null
        Returns:
        the file; may be null if unable to construct the file from the given uri
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri was null
        java.io.IOException - if unable to construct the file object

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes​(android.net.Uri uri)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Read raw bytes from a given uri
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri of a resource to read; may not be null
        Returns:
        the raw bytes of the uri
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to read the uri
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri was null
